title: Best console to ever exist!
text: This is the best console on the market!!! The best things about this console is by far the fact that it has 200gb more storage than the normal PS5, is smaller, and doesn't have any overheating issues. This is definitely worth around 700$ not 500$, yet sony decides to include one of their best PS5 games with it. I first felt a little sad for not saving up for a PC instead, but I soon realized you can connect a keyboard and mouse to this console and play some fps games and multiplayer games with it. Xbox needs to step up their game, you get 3 monthly games that you can save permanently to your library and download anytime with PlayStation plus, and after just a year of owning this console, I have acquired around 40 games from just this feature! The controllers are also great, a built in microphone, adaptive triggers than can change their resistance and a built in speaker for voice chat or for some other game features. That's not even the end of it, you can play any game in 4k buttery smooth on high settings. Why even consider getting a PC at this price range, this is worth every penny and probably more!!!

title: love this console
text: I picked up the PS5 Slim Spider-Man 2 bundle from Best Buy on March 24, 2024, and I’ve been enjoying it ever since. The console itself looks clean and compact compared to the original PS5, which makes it much easier to fit into my setup.The bundle came with a digital code for Spider-Man 2, and that game alone made the purchase worth it. Swinging through New York City with near-instant load times and amazing graphics really shows off what the PS5 can do. Even months later, I’m still impressed with how smooth and fast everything runs—not just for Spider-Man but for other games too.
